DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether healthy marriage relationship education program Elevate : Taking Your Relationship Next Level result improved couple , parenting , co-parenting behavior lead reduce child abuse/neglect potential .
DOC.brief_title: An Evaluation Healthy Marriage Relationship Education Program : Elevate
DOC.detailed_description: The study base theory couple learn skill participate Elevate curriculum help function well couple result improve relationship quality/stability , improve co-parenting skill , improve financial management , reduce financial stress . As result improve relationship skill well management stress , couple provide supportive , safe , stable family environment child . Individuals eligible ( biological parent child 0-18 remove home recently re-unified ) agree participate study randomly assign treatment group control group . Both group receive need assessment referral appropriate agency address need . Treatment group participant participate Elevate intervention ( 8 hour class 4-week period ) . Individuals control group participate intervention wait-listed eligible participate Elevate complete study ( 12 month ) . The impact study Elevate examine whether participation study improve couple function parent skill decrease instance child abuse/neglect . Members treatment control group survey three time . The survey include item related couple functioning behavior , relationship quality/stability , parenting/co-parenting skill , financial management distress . At end 12 month , Georgia 's Department Family Children Services ( DFCS ) provide information whether family ( treatment control group ) substantiate report child abuse neglect . The impact Elevate measure whether family substantiate report child abuse/neglect thereby re-enter DFCS system .
DOC.criteria: Biological parent child 018 remove home recently reunify . Parents must commit couple relationship Both parent participate study Incarceration
